Second Annual Fisticuffs Madness - Round Two, Fight!

2
Maylan
Sunday, November 5th, 2017, 11:51:06 AM

​Come rumble with White Haven at the Icehouse Tavern! We’re hosting our second fisticuffs festival to include one-on-one bracketed matches with a grand tournament champion, as well as a free-for-all melee round where last person standing will be champion. Brawling will use the existing mechanics of the Icemule tavern and a round is won when the opponent is “sacked”. All levels, skill abilities and races are welcome, and no prior brawling experience is necessary.

Details here: http://housewhitehaven.weebly.com/house-events.html
